sentences.en: A crosslinker, ammonium zirconium carbonate ( AZC ) was synthesised.
sentences.cn: 本文论述了 碳酸 锆铵交联剂的合成及其与丙烯酸乳胶的组配.

sentences.en: A kind of process for preparing hydrous zirconium fluoride is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了水合四氟化锆的一种生产工艺.

sentences.en: A stable, corrosion - resistant zirconium alloy.
sentences.cn: 锆合金一种稳定而 防腐蚀 的锆合金.

sentences.en: Chloride - furnace is the main equipment of producing zirconium sponge zirconium compound.
sentences.cn: 氯化炉是生产海绵锆及其化合物过程中的主要设备.

sentences.en: Gas reactors require enrichments in the order of up to 20%. So we need to fabricate the uranium into pellets which are clad in zirconium tubes which are placed into the reactor core.
sentences.cn: 气体反应堆要求充实，以此能,达到20%，所以，我们需要制造出在芯块中的铀,那是锆管道的金属外壳,那被放置入一个反应堆核心里去。

sentences.en: It has zirconium/hydrogen reaction rate and where it occurred, obviously about the same place. The percentage reaction.
sentences.cn: 它有锆或氢的反应速率,它发生的位置，很明显是在同样位置,百分比反应。

sentences.en: Low adding temperature and low consumption for zirconium element.
sentences.cn: 加入温度低,锆元素损耗低.

sentences.en: Niobium and niobium - zirconium wires are mainly used in lighting industry.
sentences.cn: 铌及铌锆丝大量用于制造高压钠灯.

sentences.en: The 4 d metals rhodium, palladium, and zirconium do not occur as ordered magnetic materials.
sentences.cn: 4d金属铑 、 钯 、 锆不能作为有序磁性材料.

sentences.en: The Aluminum - Zirconium coupling agent was proved to be good as paper coating.
sentences.cn: 将此偶联剂初步应用于造纸涂布中,结果表明效果良好.

sentences.en: The present work critically reviewed the corrosion behavior on zirconium alloys.
sentences.cn: 本文简要地回顾过数十年来锆合金腐蚀研究工作的进展.

sentences.en: The present work critically reviewed the uniform corrosion behavior of zirconium alloys.
sentences.cn: 本文简要地回顾过数十年来,锆合金腐蚀研究工作中对于均匀腐蚀现象的讨论.

sentences.en: The products of zirconium oxide are gradually adopted in domestic appliances.
sentences.cn: 氧化锆产品也逐步被精密机械、家用电器所采用.

sentences.en: The structure and corrosion resistance of 8 # new zirconium alloy are studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了8 # 新锆合金的组织与耐蚀性能.

sentences.en: USAGE: TO PRODUCE OTHER ZIRCONIUM PRODUCTS , PIGMENT, GLASS . ETC.
sentences.cn: 用途: 用于制备其它锆化物 、 颜料 、 玻璃等.

sentences.en: Zirconium in rare earth - magnesium - zirconium master alloy was determined by EDTA titrimetry.
sentences.cn: 采用EDTA滴定法测定了稀土镁锆中间合金中的锆.

sentences.en: Zirconium is almost as strong as steel, but lighter.
sentences.cn: 锆的强度几乎与钢相等, 但它比钢轻.

trans.tran_en: a greyish-white metallic element, occurring chiefly in zircon, that is exceptionally corrosion-resistant and has low neutron absorption. It is used as a coating in nuclear and chemical plants, as a deoxidizer in steel, and alloyed with niobium in superconductive magnets. Symbol: Zr; atomic no: 40; atomic wt: 91.224; valency: 2, 3, or 4; relative density: 6.506; melting pt: 1855±2°C; boiling pt: 4409°C
